channel.title: [317] Custom weapons and PvP [317] Rewarding answerer with Scoobie Snack
channel.description: I haven't coded long, maybe a month [and that was short after Winterlove's first release long ago :p] So I am kinda in the dark here. I have looked through the coding but I have yet to understand anything besides a bit here and there. Any help is appreciated, I'm becoming fond of custom modelling :D
